comment: Sydney SWAT needs a good sniper...nail that THUG and mop up the floor with that rag he is waving around

# ::snt Sydney SWAT needs a good sniper...nail that THUG and mop up the floor with that rag he is waving around
(n / need-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Sydney"
                  :op2 "SAT"))
      :ARG1 (s / sniper
            :ARG1-of (g2 / good-03))

                  :op2 (m / mop-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (f / floor)
                        :ARG2 (r / rag

                                    :ARG0 (h / he)
                                    :direction (a2 / around)))))))
